quote: Emotions rage inside me, something like a world war twisting inside my stomach and poking holes in my lungs. I can't pick apart reality from fantasy - does that mean insanity isn't far from my reach?
quote_letters: EMOTIONS RAGE INSIDE ME SOMETHING LIKE A WORLD WAR TWISTING INSIDE MY STOMACH AND POKING HOLES IN MY LUNGS I CANT PICK APART REALITY FROM FANTASY - DOES THAT MEAN INSANITY ISNT FAR FROM MY REACH
